title: Chicken, sweet potato & coconut curry
directions:
Heat the oil in a deep frying
pan or wok, stir in the curry paste and fry for
1 minute. Add the
chicken, sweet
potatoes and
lentils and stir to
coat in the paste,
then pour in the
stock and
coconut milk.
Bring to the boil,
then simmer for
15 minutes.

Tip in the peas,
bring back to the
boil and simmer
for a further
4-5 minutes. Season to
taste before serving.
ingredients: 2 large boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cut into bite-size pieces
2 medium-sized sweet potatoes, peeled and cut into bite-size pieces
